answers.answer: I did and later found out I was lactose intolerant from being prego. Just keep hydrated. Coconut water is the best.
I had it too I didnt have any morning sickness just nausea all day long! But instead of being sick I would have diarrhea! Its apparently very common!

Well that's good to hear, sadly lol. I have had nausea and been tired, sore boobs then yesterday I was at my local library and I had to shove my fiance my stuff and practically run to the restroom. Today has been the same way, trying to sleep and my stomach is soo upset.

I had it as well, but I found out last week that I have gestational diabetes and the food I would eat just before bed caused gas and diarrhea :( now I get constipated but still have the "I gotta go!" Pains, it feels awful... Hope this is not the case for you, good luck :)

I had it in my earlier pregnancy. Yes it was a bit of a pain. I also was throwing up which I had best of both worlds yayy. Lol It was because I was dehydrated.... keep drinking water & becareful what you eat also!! #GoodLuck

question: Has anyone had diarrhea during early pregnancy? For the last two days my stomach has been so upset and angry. I'm wondering if it's something I ate, nerves, or just something to expect.
title: sorry gross, but diarrhea?
